content:
Craft an item of type: light_gray_bed
inventory=[{"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_nether_bricks", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 17}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 10, "index": 21}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 27, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 15, "index": 29}, {"type": "clay", "quantity": 5, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 27, "index": 39}, {"type": "polished_diorite_stairs", "quantity": 40, "index": 44}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a light_gray_bed, I need to first craft light_gray_dye. The simplest way to do this is to use a white_tulip to create light_gray_dye. I will move the white_tulip to the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: light_gray_bed
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "white_tulip", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_nether_bricks", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 17}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 10, "index": 21}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 27, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 15, "index": 29}, {"type": "clay", "quantity": 5, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 27, "index": 39}, {"type": "polished_diorite_stairs", "quantity": 40, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that I have crafted the light_gray_dye, I need to move it from the crafting grid to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: light_gray_bed
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_nether_bricks", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 17}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 10, "index": 21}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 27, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 15, "index": 29}, {"type": "clay", "quantity": 5, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 27, "index": 39}, {"type": "polished_diorite_stairs", "quantity": 40, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a light_gray_bed, I need to place the light_gray_dye and the white_bed side-by-side in the crafting grid. I will first move the dye from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: light_gray_bed
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 12}, {"type": "red_nether_bricks", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 17}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 10, "index": 21}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 27, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 15, "index": 29}, {"type": "clay", "quantity": 5, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 27, "index": 39}, {"type": "polished_diorite_stairs", "quantity": 40, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a light_gray_bed, I need to place the light_gray_dye and the white_bed side-by-side in the crafting grid. The dye has been placed in slot 1, so I will now move the bed to slot 2 (to the right of slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: light_gray_bed
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "red_nether_bricks", "quantity": 56, "index": 14}, {"type": "ocelot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 22, "index": 17}, {"type": "lime_wool", "quantity": 10, "index": 21}, {"type": "crimson_roots", "quantity": 27, "index": 28}, {"type": "blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 15, "index": 29}, {"type": "clay", "quantity": 5, "index": 38}, {"type": "orange_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 27, "index": 39}, {"type": "polished_diorite_stairs", "quantity": 40, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a light_gray_bed, I need to place the light_gray_dye and the white_bed side-by-side in the crafting grid. I have done this, and the bed has been crafted in the craft slot (0), so I will now move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
